CONSOLE.description: This is a browser feature intended only for developers. Copying and pasting anything in here is prohibited.

NOTES: This contains framework infomarions and configurations.
PROJECT: This for user's project details, this portion will appear on system log.
FRAMEWORK: This is not for user configuration, any changes in this portion is forbidden.
DATABASE: The sql database connection info will be configured through this portion.
SETTINGS: This allows tab icon, tab name, and framework's watermark to be displayed in user's project.
This also includes system log to be recorded and to be displayed in user's project.
This will also allow to customize user's error display instead of default system error display.
EXTENSIONS: This will allow users to manage framework's external library
API_CONTROLLER_CLASS: Class name of api controller should be within this array, otherwise api controller will recieve an error.
PUBLIC: This portion allow users to include external css and js. The path of the file inside public folder should be included within the array.
